sub_topic: Calculating the heat of formation of a molecule
message_1: What is the heat of formation for methane (CH4) at standard conditions (25°C and 1 atm pressure)? Provide your answer in kilojoules per mole (kJ/mol).
message_2: The heat of formation (ΔHf°) for methane (CH4) at standard conditions (25°C and 1 atm pressure) is -74.8 kJ/mol.
